reviewText: One of the best Argentinian movies of all times. Sadly the recording quality it's so bad. On this film you will find the best Argentine comic actors ever. La none interpreted by Pepe Soriano is a master piece.

I own the disk for several years now and it is an awful laserdisk transfer. The play is magnificent, the acting superb, the quality worst than a VHS tranfer. It states on the cover that it contains english captions but it does not.

If you are a true dedicated fan geti it, orelse pass it. Someday something better will come along your way. At least I truly hope so myself!
Hi, Im crazy about this movie, but I cant find it anywhere, can you  tell me if somebody is selling it...????
